content: We don't know whether the seller was legit or a troll.

data.title: Fake Car
data.description: Someone offered Paul a car, but after travelling hundreds of miles to collect it - the seller never showed.

data.title: Trip to College
data.description: Paul took a trip to Nottingham College to ask about learning to code. He also wore a coat, which caused him to overheat and trip over in the street.
